primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God communicates His final, complete self-revelation and salvation through Jesus Christ to humanity, establishing a dynamic relationship that bypasses human efforts of self-justification.

tekstueel_bewijs: God has spoken to us by his Son
He [the Son] had provided purification for sins
God again set a certain day, calling it 'Today'
a Sabbath-rest for the people of God
In the past God spoke... but in these last days he has spoken
remains for some to enter that rest
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is positioned as the Receiver who must 'rest' from their own works.

helper.identificatie: The Holy Spirit and the Written Word
tekstueel_bewijs: the Holy Spirit writes the law of God on your heart
the word of God is alive and active
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject; the Word is the instrument (Helper) through which He acts.
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling power that internalizes the Word.

tekstueel_bewijs: working so hard to achieve it ourselves
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is the 'deadly doing'—the human drive to be one's own savior, which leads to spiritual death.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The believer's response: accepting the Word's authority and resting from self-justifying works.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program (human effort to 'make every effort to enter rest') is strictly a response to the primary program (Christ's finished work).

voorbeelden_god_subject: He sat down at the right hand
The Word of God... judges the thoughts
voorbeelden_mens_subject: we have to update our own views
we’re all trying to achieve significance

voorbeelden: Let us, therefore, make every effort
you just want the world for that child
you have to understand the main message
the Word of God is alive and active
God is greater than our hearts

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon emphasizes the 'Pouvoir' (Power) of the Word and Christ to perform what the human 'Devoir' (Must) cannot achieve.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (trying to achieve significance) to ~S1 (restlessness/anxiety) to S1 (resting in Christ's finished work).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by Christ 'sitting down' (S1), which allows the hearer to move from ~S1 to S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the 'sword' of the Word and the 'account' to be given are presented as fearsome realities.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. It identifies human effort as the problem (restlessness) and God's speech/action in Christ as the only solution.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Let us, therefore, make every effort to enter that rest

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as the active Subject of salvation
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: After he had provided purification for sins, he sat down.
Lay your deadly doing down... Stand in him alone.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures (Abraham, David, Joshua) are used to show the insufficiency of the old system or human failure, not as moral templates.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God provides the rest that Joshua could not.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the 'thousand deaths' of performance-based identity.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic sanctification: the Word does the work of 'piercing' and 'healing'.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon perfectly integrates the doctrine of Scripture (Soteriology of the Word) with the doctrine of Christ (Soteriology of the Person).

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: He was pierced unto destruction so we could be pierced... unto life.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir' by writing the law on the heart.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; sin is 'self-absorption' that requires a 'piercing' to expose.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The narrative engine is driven by God's speech. Man is the object of God's surgical action.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a classic grace structure.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (self-justification) is already treated as a 'deadly' force.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in maintaining God as the Subject. It successfully navigates the 'Rutledge Rule' by making God's Word the active agent of change.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'three points'; semiotics reveals the 'engine' is Christ's finished work vs. human 'deadly doing'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains Hebrews; semiotics explains how the sermon's structure forces the hearer to stop acting and start receiving.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas's model exposes that even when the preacher talks about 'effort' (Heb 4:11), the actantial Subject remains God's Word/Spirit, preventing the sermon from sliding into legalism.

appendices.notities: The preacher uses personal vulnerability (the 'thousand deaths' of preaching) to reinforce the hearer's identification with the 'Receiver' actant.
